com.ibm.lpex.samples
Class TestCommand

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.ibm.lpex.samples.TestCommand
public class TestCommand
extends java.lang.Object
implements LpexCommand

This class is a sample command implementation. Running this command will display a short message on the editor message line.

Here is the TestCommand code.

To run this sample:

  • Compile the command class: 
    javac TestCommand.java
  • Define the command, by entering this on the editor command line: 
    set commandClass.testCommand com.ibm.lpex.samples.TestCommand
  • Run the command from the editor command line, by entering: 
    testCommand message

See Also:
LpexCommand, LpexView
